Hey everyone, this is a great tv-series. Please download and share. I've personally bought this after watching it and encourage everyone else to do the same. Maybe they'll make a second season if those creeps in hollywood get the picture that this is a show loved by many, many people. There are many firefly parties in the US, but overseas commitment is also important. I'll seed for a long while, so do not be afraid to download. I may be off from time to time, but I do try to seed at night (central european time).
